forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this morning, then increasing winds with thunderstorms developing during the afternoon hours. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers this morning, then increasing winds with thunderstorms developing during the afternoon hours. High 59F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers with a possible thunderstorm early, then variable clouds overnight with still a chance of showers. Low 8C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers likely and possibly a thunderstorm this evening, then some lingering showers still possible overnight. Low 47F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
